head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HURWITZ, ALFRED L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HURWITZ, ALFRED L.

block.p: HURWITZ--Alfred L. The National Board of Hadassah, WZOA, mourns the death of Alfred L. Hurwitz, husband of Ruth B Hurwitz, Past National Treasurer. Our heartfelt condolences go to the entire family. May his memory be for a blessing. June Walker, National President Morlie Levin, National Executive Director

HURWITZ--Alfred L. The National Board of Hadassah, WZOA, mourns the death of Alfred L. Hurwitz, husband of Ruth B Hurwitz, Past National Treasurer. Our heartfelt condolences go to the entire family. May his memory be for a blessing. June Walker, National President Morlie Levin, National Executive Director
